title: GAZZA!!!
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/community-events/announcing-australia/new-zealand-localisation-pack

is this seriously gonna happen or is it just an april fools joke?

replies.body:
OMG I DID **NOT** SEE THAT COMING 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
its most likely going to be for one patch, just like bazza and dazza was.

I think we can safely assume it's for april fools, I seriously doubt this is going to become a thing (unless the community actually takes action to make it happen, and we all know that isn't going to happen).
It will probably be for just one patch
